See the License for the specific language governing rights * and limitations under the License. * The Original Code is Compiere ERP & Business Solution * The Initial Developer of the Original Code is Jorg Janke and ComPiere, Inc. * Portions created by Jorg Janke are Copyright (C) 1999-2001 Jorg Janke, * parts created by ComPiere are Copyright (C) ComPiere, Inc.; * All Rights Reserved. * Contributor(s): Openbravo SL * Contributions are Copyright (C) 1999-2005 Openbravo, S.L ************************************************************************* * New Accounting Defaults */ TYPE RECORD IS REF CURSOR; Cur_Defaults RECORD; BEGIN FOR Cur_Defaults IN ( SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Default d WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM AD_ClientInfo c WHERE d.C_AcctSchema_ID IN(c.C_AcctSchema1_ID, c.C_AcctSchema2_ID, c.C_AcctSchema3_ID) AND AD_Client_ID=:new.AD_Client_ID ) ) LOOP INSERT INTO C_Withholding_Acct ( C_Withholding_ID, C_AcctSchema_ID, AD_Client_ID, AD_Org_ID, IsActive, Created, CreatedBy, Updated, UpdatedBy, Withholding_Acct ) VALUES ( :new.C_Withholding_ID, Cur_Defaults.C_AcctSchema_ID, :new.AD_Client_ID, :new.AD_ORG_ID, 'Y', now(), :new.CreatedBy, now(), :new.UpdatedBy, Cur_Defaults.Withholding_Acct ) ; END LOOP; END C_WITHHOLDING_TRG
